sources.title: LtangEnchant
sources.description: Sadly, only a fragment of this film seems to have survived. Fortunately, we are here to view it. I don't know about you but watching this made me want to go play outside. Maybe it was the jumping water sprites? Director: Segundo de Chomón Writer: Segundo de Chomón Stars: Julienne Mathieu Country: France Language: French Release Date: 23 November 1907 (USA) Also Known As: The Enchanted Pond Production Co: Pathé Frères Sound Mix: Silent Color: Black and White
